description:
The app gives you simple tools to plan your Target Run, find everything you need, and save money online and in stores.


Previous App

A few features from the previous version are not yet available in the new version. We’re working hard to build an even better experience for those features, which will be back soon. If you have a registry, TargetList, or mobile GiftCard, you can access it via Target.com. Thanks for your patience.


Featured

Love deals? 

View the latest products and deals from our stores and Target.com. Page through the Weekly Ad, browse Cartwheel, or find price cuts available in your store.

 
List

Making your shopping list should be fast and easy. 

Prepare for your next run using your own words or specific Target items. Launch the barcode scanner to add items as you run out. When you’re in-store, tap on any red aisle icon to see the location on a map of your store.
 

Find

Can I help you find something?

Search or browse our entire assortment. Share your location to see prices, promotions, item availability and aisle location for the stores you shop most. Found what you need? You can ship it to your home, pick it up in a store, or add it to your list.
 

Checkout

Simple and secure purchases. 

Build a cart or use express checkout for a single item purchases -  the Target app makes it easy to place an order in no time.


Apple Pay

You can use your iPhone 6 to pay in an easy, secure, and private way in the app with a single touch. Note: Apple Pay is not supported in stores.
releaseNotes:
What's new in 7.1.2:

• Minor bug fixes.


What's new in 7.1.1:

• Product pages load faster than ever.
• Fixed a bug where some guests were not seeing their mobile coupon.
• Fixed a bug where some iOS 7 users saw a crash when loading the Store Finder Map.
• Fixed a bug where iOS 7 users lost the ability to interact with search.


What's new in 7.1:

Thanks for all of your feedback on the new app. We’ve been busy prepping new features and fixes to get you ready for the holidays:

Apple Pay:
Pay for your entire cart in one tap using Apple Pay. No Target account required.

Reviews:
Get the inside scoop by reading reviews on product pages.

Mobile Coupons:
Your favorite way to save is back. Sign up in the app and redeem in-store.

Black Friday Store Maps:
Find all of the door-busters in your store during your Black Friday Target Run. Open the app between 6pm on Thanksgiving and 8am on Black Friday for a special easter egg.

Search:
Search is faster, more relevant and easy to access from the top of the Featured and Find tabs.

Ways to Buy:
Tap “ship it" or "pick up" on product pages to add to your cart.

Store Finder:
See your nearest store or the store you shop most with the app, or get details on other nearby stores.

Checkout:
We’ve made many more improvements to checkout to help make buying easy. Plus, get free shipping just for the holidays. Order by December 19, and get delivery before Christmas.
